ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Stones
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, my problem was finding giants, not the stones.  I killed the only giant I saw all night that wasn t already taken, and got one stone. This was in
ygData.messageBody:
Valharick@... wrote:
>
> From: Valharick@...
>
> Don't know how much anyone else has looked so far, but my search was a bust.
> Killed 19 HG's and no not one had a lambent on it; at least the loot if good.
> Wouldn't have gotten one all night had it not been for someone kind enought
> to toss one my way (and another for Shada from his friend :) ).
> I don't know how anyone else's luck has been, but if for every piece I go for
> I have to kill 20+ HG's. It's gonna be a LONG time before I have even 2 or 3
> pieces. Ah well, guess thats Verant's idea to keep me here :P

Well, my problem was finding giants, not the stones. I killed the only
giant I saw all night that wasn't already taken, and got one stone.
This was in Rathe Mountains.
What zone were you in? All the giant-bearing zones seemed to be
particularly busy last night.

Jyzan
